content.en: Digital heritage analysis: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can be used to advance social impact assessment, analyze cultural ecosystem services, and identify current topics and trends in digital heritage. They are using machine learning, image digitization, data aggregation and visualization techniques, as well as Google's Cloud Vision algorithm, artificial intelligence, and computer vision algorithms. However, they are also investigating the biases and potential threats introduced by machine learning and artificial intelligence in cultural heritage datasets.
content.da: Analyse af digital arv: Forskere undersøger, hvordan algoritmer kan bruges til at fremme vurdering af social indvirkning, analysere kulturelle økosystemtjenester og identificere aktuelle emner og trends inden for digital arv. De bruger maskinlæring, billeddigitalisering, dataaggregering og visualiseringsteknikker samt Googles Cloud Vision-algoritme, kunstig intelligens og computer vision-algoritmer. Samtidig undersøger de også de skævheder og potentielle trusler, som maskinlæring og kunstig intelligens introducerer i kulturelle arv-datasæt.
